reviews.review: I have been searching for the perfect game that will keep my attention and entertain me for my whole life, and now I’m in love with this amazing game that entertains me for countless hours on end. If you are interested in buying this game in the slightest, DO NOT HESITATE!! When you get in just don’t think that you’ll understand how to play it well right off the bat, it takes practice but it is well worth the time spent. This is also a GREAT game to play with friends (there is a option to play with your friends, if you’re wondering about that). Fair warning though this game is very buggy and is still being developed, but bugs can be EASILY overlooked.

ИГРА КАК ВСЕ ЗНАЮТ НЕПЛОХАЯ.ВЕРНЕЕ ЗАДУМКА.А ТЕПЕРЬ ПО СУТИ..ДАЖЕ НЕ ПЕРЕЧИСЛИТЬ СКОЛЬКО БАГОВ ИВСЯЧЕСКИХ ЗАТУПОВ..ОЧЕНЬ ЧАСТО ВИСНЕТ И ВЫЛЕТАЕТ ИЗ ИГРЫ.БЫВАЕТ ПРЯМ ПОСРЕДИ КАТКИ..ЗА ЧТО ПЛАТИЛ ДЕНЬГИ НЕ ПОНЯТНО..ПИДОРАСЫ ОДНИМ СЛОВОМ РАЗРАБЫ.и если вылетел с игры то все предметы и улучшения проподают..далее прикол..когда получаешь хита тебе дается рывок ускорение..но это трагедия потому как выглядит это как пинок под жопу и ты втыкаешься во все что на пути попалосьююпока ты там втыкаешься убийца уже обтер оружее и дал тебе смертельного хита..часто дергаеться и провисает..много кашмарных моментов напоминающих пир ту пир в фор хоноре..да и когда выходят патчи с обновой это английский язык..какого хера я что должен сидеть со словорем блядь..спешу дополнить свой обзор..баги лаги это все понятно.но нужно еще умудриться зайти в игру и в лобби.блядь когда сука вы сделаете нормальную игру..не графики не хера..так хоть отчиканьте игру чтоб как часы работала

真的..真的，人太少了，我只想说这款游戏自身是不错的，而且由于网易的第五人格的推广，使得这类游戏可能会大放光彩，但是由于焚化部的禁播和抵制，导致黎明杀机现在不可能在中国很火，游戏开发商对中国玩家的态度可以说是非常友善了，不仅应了广大玩家的要求出了杨永信，也出了一个中国求生者，在中国禁播的情况下，没人玩的情况下，也依然为中国出了新年活动，游戏厂商虽然是一个小公司，但是却做得比某些大公司好的多，有人说这游戏bug多，外挂多，可是你有没有想过人家只是一个小公司，而且人家也在努力的增强这方面的措施，还有人说，屠夫太强，可这游戏本来就是1v4不公平竞争啊
游戏是个非常好的游戏，这也是我STEAM上的第一款游戏，跟朋友开黑很有意思，但是现在某易制作的第五人格让我很反感，希望能去投诉封杀

gutes spiel aber unfassbar verbuggt
spiels nun seit nem halben jahr und bugg technisch wirds nicht besser. stattdessen wird darauf wert gelegt neue chapter (neue killer und survivor) zuentwickeln und rauszubringen, statt das spiel wie es bisher ist auf einen soliden stand zu bringen... hab seit längerem den bug nicht durch den ladebildschirm zu kommen da der balken auf 5% stopt (die lade animation aber weiter geht) und alle anderen bei 95% warten... einzige lösung da ist alt+f4... also wie gesagt ein sehr gutes spiel wenn man denn ins game kommt man vollzählig ist und nicht den unzähligen buggs zum opfer fällt.

Okay, so a few years and 80 hours later, I change my mind. Almost every single aspect I had gripes about (apart from survivors bitching, probably) is changed. No more true infinites, odd bulb isn't remotely a pain it was, brand new part nerfed, Freddy reworked and is better than ever, sabbo meta is officially dead... What a time to be alive.

/////old////
Game dev son is probably playing survivor. 
Survivors are easy points and easy victories. Killers are easy frustration, and require a significant amount of effort.
I have played intermittently since beta, but I didn't really have fun at any point since the very beggining. As soon as survivors realised how OP certain perks and builds are(brand new part, odd bulb, decisive strike etc.) game became a shit fest for killers. Worst of all, it seems that game devs only ever listen to survivors.
Poor Freddy. Somehow they managed to nerf him, despite him being one of worst, if not the worst killers in the game. Just beacuse survivors were whining about him.
Dev's don't really care, and recommend killer players to play survivor or other games. I am not even joking, it is an actual recommendation from a dev stream.
I think I am just going to take this advice.
And, who could forget, probably the most toxic playerbase ever concieved by maknind.
I played LoL, Dota and Dota 2, SC 2 ranked, and never have I ever seen people bitch so much. Survivors bitch when they win. Survivors bitch when they loose. And still despite that they still play in most toxic, unfun ways imaginable. 
Survive with Friends being in the same match making as single player survivors is borderline retarded. What the fuck? Haven't it occured to you to separate solo queue and premade team qeues? This idea was around since forverer, why wouldn't you do that?
Enjoy your dead game.

I love this game. They always release a new killer, survivor, and map every four months or so. This game usually has me at the edge of my seat. From time to time sometimes you deal with face camping killers or trolling survivors. It happens, but nothing is as satisfying as killing a trolling survivor or successfully escaping a face camper. This game is not only amazing playing solo, but you can even play with friends. I gotta say kill your friends mode is very nice. ;)
I give this a 10/10.

超级好玩这游戏超级好玩
第一次玩这种类型的游戏玩的超级开心，同时也谢谢开发组这么照顾中国玩家。
说实话我是因为玩了一把第五人格我才来玩的，我希望起诉同时也希望别起诉，因为我真的希望第五人格能把这款游戏待会大家的视野就像第五人格把这款游戏带到了我的面前。同时也觉得如果我是开发商我应该会很痛苦自己做出来这么棒的作品给人抄袭了。
不管怎么样都希望这款游戏能再次火起来就好，真的拜托了。

So, the 1.6k hours and 3 years I have in this game, I have seen the ups and downs within this game. Dead by Daylight is nowhere near perfect, but the friends you make through this game, and the countless scares and laughs this game brings are truly worth it. Yes, there are moments where you question why you still play the game, complain about it's problems etc. But, you will always find yourself coming back to this game. The player base of this game tries to find every negative aspect about it, or ponders why the game isn't perfect. No game IMO is perfect. This game is a great introduction into a co-op game for new players looking for fun with friends. A plentiful group of survivors to choose from, as well as killers. Overall, I personally think this game is great, despite it's problems. I don't regret the time nor money put into this game.

The game is complete crap because of the matchmaking system and mainly toxic community, 99% of which consists of completely degraded, lowest in terms of the their disgusting behavior, survivor mainly playing players, whose sole motivation and purpose to play this game seems to be mocking killers and insult them in the post-game chat, regardless of whether they win or lose the match. It is sad and so disappointing, that over many years of existence of this game, so little attention and effort have been dedicated to trying to keep community friendly and healthy. It's such a shame that this game has become a perfect environment for disgusting and ugly from inside people to show their true colors and spread hate, toxicity and apparently enjoy it, to the point that this seems to be their only reason to play it. It is impossible to express, how upsetting this is that no one minds that, and things are left the way they are... Censorship of the post-game chat has changed nothing and are absolutely free to insult in other than English languages. Everything would have been so much better if players were notified about certain actions/punishments, that have been taken against these offenders, like it is done in various other games, but again, no apparently seems to care, neither developers, nor community.

Let me start by saying the concept and game are good and at times can be incredibly enjoyable. If you prefer balance and diversity as I do, then I would not recommend this game. This game is not only plagued with a horribly toxic and abusive community but the worst part of all is that the developers seem to just ignore issues. If you are thinking of jumping into this game, be warned that it will be frustrating for quite some time because you don't have the best perks or equipment and will be heavily disadvantaged against more experienced players. Survivors can all learn perks specific to other unique survivors so eventually playing a survivor is just a cosmetic choice vs a playstyle choice. Some Killers are very interesting and fun to play as such as the Hillbilly or Nurse and other Killers tend to get ignored and swept under the rug such as Freddy. 

I like to play Survivor and Killer equally but I found that Survivors tend to exploit and abuse certain game mechanics more so in order to win (i.e. Pallet Looping). In summary I would recommend doing your research before buying this game, but if you find enjoyment out of this game by all means play it.

Coming from the NA region- New Mexico, USA to be specific. Region wise even on the more "dead" times like 2am-6am mountain time you still find people on. I met my boyfriend and some really good friend from this game and that alone, i would give it a positive review. 

But what else do I like about this game? Graphics are decent even on low settings, and very fun to play. High graphic settings just make it better.  Keep in mind you have to earn points to get perks which basically makes it easier to survive or kill, so you have to give it some time. Very fun with friends. Love this game and would recommend it to anyone who enjoys community games/ team work. Events are usually pretty fun.

There are down sides- salty killers, survivors, toxic people- but really, you should expect that with any game. Someone ALWAYS thinks their better than another and like to do things like pointing or end-game T-bagging. I'm a survivor main and i think that survivors can be salty little shits. But so can killers. I've put in PLENTY of hours of this game and i keep coming back always.

Devsi nie naprawiają bugów i skupiają się jedynie na wypuszczaniu nowych dlc. Hostem gry jest zawsze killer przez co to od niego zależy czy będzie dobry ping (zazwyczaj nie jest). Ponadto killerzy cały czas dostają buffy co utrudnia grę dla survivorów. Gracz który da się złapać ma niewielkie szanse na przetrwanie jeżeli nie gra z kolegami, a nawet jeżeli ma się drużynę to i tak ratowanie kogoś przed camperem jest ryzykowne, a w przypadku, gdy killer gra Leatherfacem to jest to niemożliwe. Developerzy tak bardzo nie interesują się własną grą, że nawet nie banują ludzi, korzystających z cheatów (nawet gdy cheaterzy nagrywają to i wstawiają na youtube, gdzie ma to kilkutysięczne zasięgi). Fakt, że mechanika gry jest w porządku i przyjemnie się gra, ale problemy, które opisałem wcześniej nie wpływają pozytywnie na zabawę. Generalnie nie polecam kupowania tej gry do czasu aż bugi zostaną naprawione i powstaną serwery twórców i gra nie będzie hostowana przez jedną osobę.

Edit: Nie wspomniałem o tym, że system zgłoszeń może być nadużywany i przy zbyt dużej ilości zgłoszeń można dostać bana za nic.

Для меня эта игра стала открытием в таком жанре, так как я не очень любила игры в команде, мне казалось, что другие игроки всё портят, но тут не так, игра даже очень сильно зависит от твоих действий (но не всегда, бывают исключения,редиски тоже попадаются в катке ). Довольно большой выбор персонажей для игры, что очень радует, так как это вносит разнообразие в игровой процесс. После покупки этой игы я познакомилась со многими замечательными людьми, с которыми играю и до сих пор, а ещё я как великий гипнотезёр затащила своих дузей из реала в эту игрушку и они не могут оторваться от неё. Сама атмосфера игы даже очень приятненькая, музыкальное сопровождение даже очень годное. Данная игрушка стала моей первой покупкой в Steam, я этому очень рада, не ошиблась в выборе. Обязательно стоит попробовать в неё поиграть, а если у вас ещё и компания хорошая, то это просто потрясющее сочетание для хороших каток. Не сомневайтесь, игра стоит своих денюшек )

看了微博上的骂战之后（指的是某po主站出来把网易的第5人格都抄袭了哪些作品挨个列了个单子，却被网易花钱雇的水军狂喷，ps：网易雇的那帮水军直接人身攻击，都不装一下的。。。），    果断来杀鸡补票。
虽然后来网易又发了跟该公司合作的证据，但是我还是觉得恶心。
Отсутствие баланса для соло-жертв. Не для слабонервных.
Не затянула
A very interesting game.
